# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-104">Definizioni delle entità tipo di informazioni sensibili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-105">La prevenzione della perdita dei dati (DLP) nel Centro conformità include molti tipi di informazioni riservate pronti per l'uso nei criteri DLP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-106">Questo articolo elenca tutti questi tipi di informazioni riservate e mostra cosa cerca un criterio DLP quando rileva ogni tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-107">Per ulteriori informazioni sui tipi di informazioni riservate, vedere [Tipi di informazioni riservate](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-108">Numero di routing ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-109">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-110">nove cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-111">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-112">due cifre negli intervalli 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 o 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-113">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-114">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-115">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-116">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-117">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-118">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-119">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-120">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-121">Un criterio ha una probabilità media di rilevamento di questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-122">La funzione Func_aba_routing restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-123">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ABA_Routing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-124">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-125">La funzione Func_aba_routing restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-143">Numero DNI (Argentina National Identity)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-144">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-145">Otto cifre con o senza punti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-146">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-147">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-148">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-149">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-150">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-151">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-152">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-153">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-154">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-155">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-156">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-157">L'espressione regolare Regex_argentina_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-158">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_argentina_national_id dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-170">Codice identificativo fiscale univoco argentina (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-171">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-172">Undici cifre con trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-172">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-173">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-174">Undici cifre con un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-174">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-175">due cifre in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 o 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-176">un trattino (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-177">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-178">un trattino (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-179">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-180">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-181">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-182">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-183">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-184">La funzione `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-185">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-186">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-187">La funzione `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-226">Numero di conto corrente bancario Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-227">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-228">da sei a dieci cifre con o senza un numero di filiale dello stato della banca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-228">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-229">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-230">Il numero di account è da 6 a 10 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-231">Numero BSB australiano:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-232">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-233">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-234">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-235">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-236">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-237">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-238">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-239">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-240">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-241">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-242">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-243">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-244">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-285">La funzione Func_australian_business_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-316">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Australian_Company_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-316">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-317">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-317">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-318">La funzione Func_Australian_Company_Number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-318">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-328">Numero di patente australiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-329">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-330">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-331">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-332">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-333">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-334">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-335">cinque cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-336">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-337">da una a due lettere facoltative (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-338">da quattro a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-339">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-340">nove cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-341">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-342">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-343">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-344">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-345">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-346">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-347">Non vengono trovate parole chiava da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-447">Numero di conto medico Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-448">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-449">10-11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-450">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-451">10-11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-452">La prima cifra è compresa nell'intervallo 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-453">Nove cifre è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-453">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-454">La decima cifra è la cifra del problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-455">L'undicesima cifra (facoltativa) è il numero singolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-456">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-457">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-458">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-459">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-460">La funzione Func_australian_medical_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-461">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-462">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-474">Numero di passaporto australiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-475">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-476">otto o nove caratteri alfanumerici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-477">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-478">una lettera (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) seguita da 7 cifre o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by 7 digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-479">2 lettere (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) seguite da 7 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-479">2 letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by 7 digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-480">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-481">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-482">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-483">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-484">L'espressione `Regex_australia_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-485">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_australia_passport_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-486">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-487">L'espressione `Regex_australia_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-507">Numero di file fiscale australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-508">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-509">da otto a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-510">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-511">da otto a nove cifre in genere presentate con spazi come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-512">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-513">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-514">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-515">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-516">da due a tre cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-517">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-518">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-519">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-520">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-521">La funzione Func_australian_tax_file_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-522">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number o da Keyword_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-523">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-524">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-524">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-535">Austria - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-536">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-537">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-538">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-539">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-540">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-541">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-542">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-543">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-544">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-545">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-672">Carta d'identità Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-673">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-674">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-675">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-676">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-677">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-678">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-679">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-680">Una combinazione di 24 caratteri di lettere, cifre e caratteri speciali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-681">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-682">24 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-683">22 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre o segni più</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-684">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre, segni più o segni di uguale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-685">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-686">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-687">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-688">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-689">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-690">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-691">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-693">identity number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-694">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-696">Numero di passaporto austriano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-697">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-698">Una lettera seguita da uno spazio facoltativo e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-699">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-700">Combinazione di una lettera, sette cifre e uno spazio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-701">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-702">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-703">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-704">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-705">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-706">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-707">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-708">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-709">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-710">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-711">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-712">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-713">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-737">Austria - Numero di previdenza sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-738">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-739">10 cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-740">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-741">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-742">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero di serie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-743">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-744">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-745">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-746">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-747">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-748">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-749">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-750">viene trovata una  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` parola chiave da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-751">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-752">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-753">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-753">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-754">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-754">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-755">austrian ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-755">austrian ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-759">insurancecode #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-759">insurancecode#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-760">numero di assicurazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-760">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-761">assicurazione no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-761">insurance no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-762">krankenkassennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-762">krankenkassennummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-763">krankenversicherung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-763">krankenversicherung</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-764">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-764">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-765">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-765">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-766">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-766">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-767">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-767">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-768">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-768">social security code</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-778">Numero di identificazione fiscale Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-779">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-780">nove cifre con trattino facoltativo e barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-781">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-782">nove cifre con trattino facoltativo e barra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-783">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-784">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-785">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-786">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-787">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-788">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-789">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-790">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-791">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-792">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-793">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-794">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-795">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-818">Imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-819">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-820">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-821">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-822">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-823">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-824">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-825">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-826">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-827">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-828">Motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-829">A o a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-830">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-831">Spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-832">U o u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-833">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-834">due o tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-835">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-836">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-837">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-838">una o due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-839">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-840">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-841">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-842">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-843">La funzione Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-844">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-845">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-846">La funzione Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-864">Chiave di autenticazione di Azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-865">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-866">La stringa "DocumentDb" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-867">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-868">Stringa "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-869">Qualsiasi combinazione di 3-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-870">Un simbolo di maggiore di (>), un segno di uguale (=), una virgoletta (") o un apostrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-871">Qualsiasi combinazione di 86 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-872">Due segni di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-873">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-874">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-875">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-876">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-877">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-878">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1091">Chiave dell'account di archiviazione di Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1091">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1092">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1093">Stringa "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente, inclusa la stringa "AccountKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1093">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1094">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1094">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1095">la stringa "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1095">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1096">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1096">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1097">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1097">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1098">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1098">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1099">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1099">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1100">la stringa "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1100">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1101">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1101">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1102">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1102">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1103">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1104">qualsiasi combinazione di 86 caratteri minuscoli o maiuscoli, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1104">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1105">due segni di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1105">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1106">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1107">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1107">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1108">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1109">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1110">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1110">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1111">L'espressione CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1111">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1112">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1112">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1130">Archiviazione di Azure account utente (generica)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1131">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1132">Qualsiasi combinazione di 86 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+), preceduta o seguita dai caratteri indicati nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1133">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1134">da zero a uno dei simboli di maggiore di (>), apostrofo ('), segno di uguale (=), virgolette (") o simbolo di numero (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1135">qualsiasi combinazione di 86 caratteri minuscoli o maiuscoli, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1136">due segni di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1137">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1138">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1139">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1140">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1141">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1142">Numero di patente di guida belgio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1143">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1144">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1145">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1146">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1146">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1147">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1148">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1148">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1149">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1150">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1151">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1152">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
