## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1285">Belgio - Numero nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1286">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1287">11 cifre più delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1288">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1289">11 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1290">sei cifre e due punti facoltativi nel formato AA. MM.DD per la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1291">Delimitatore facoltativo da punto, trattino, spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1292">tre cifre sequenziali (dispari per i maschi, anche per le femmine)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1293">Delimitatore facoltativo da punto, trattino, spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1294">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1295">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1296">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1297">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1298">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1299">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1300">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_belgium_national_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1301">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1302">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1303">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1304">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1363">Belgio - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1364">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1365">due lettere seguite da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1366">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1367">due lettere e seguito da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1368">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1369">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1369">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1370">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1371">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1372">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1373">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1374">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date2` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AA o una parola chiave da o viene `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1375">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1376">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1377">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1404">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto del Belgio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1404">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1405">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1406">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1407">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1408">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1409">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1410">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1411">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1412">Motivo alfanumerico a 12 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1413">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1414">Motivo alfanumerico a 12 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1415">una lettera B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1416">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1417">una cifra 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1418">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1419">un punto facoltativo o un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1420">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1421">un punto facoltativo o un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1422">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1423">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1424">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1425">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1426">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1427">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1428">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1429">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1430">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1435">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1435">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1436">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1436">numéro t.v.a</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1442">Brasile - Numero CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1443">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1444">11 cifre che includono una cifra di controllo e possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1445">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1446">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1447">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1448">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1449">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1450">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1451">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1452">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1453">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1454">Non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1455">11 cifre dove le ultime due sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1456">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1457">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1458">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1459">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1460">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1461">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_brazil_cpf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1462">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1463">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1464">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1465">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1473">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1473">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1474">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1474">Identificação</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1477">Numero della persona giuridica del Brasile (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1478">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1479">14 cifre che includono il numero di registrazione, il codice della filiale, le cifre di controllo e i delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1480">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1481">14 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1482">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1483">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1483">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1484">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1484">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1485">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1485">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1486">tre cifre (queste prime otto cifre sono il numero di registrazione)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1487">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1487">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1488">Numero di ramo a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1489">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1489">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1490">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1491">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1492">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1493">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1494">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1495">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1496">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_brazil_cnpj da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1497">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1498">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1499">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1500">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1522">Carta di identità nazionale (RG) del Brasile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1523">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1524">Registro Geral (formato precedente): nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato): 11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1526">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1527">Registro Geral (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1528">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1528">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1529">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1529">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1530">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1530">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1531">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1531">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1532">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1532">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1533">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1533">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1534">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1536">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1536">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1537">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1537">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1538">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1539">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1540">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1541">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1542">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1543">La funzione Func_brazil_rg trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1544">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_brazil_rg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1545">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1546">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1546">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1547">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1547">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1548">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1548">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1549">carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1549">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1550">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1550">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1551">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1551">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1553">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1553">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1554">RG (questa parola chiave fa distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1554">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1555">RIC (questa parola chiave fa distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1555">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1556">Numero di patente di guida bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1557">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1558">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1559">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1560">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1560">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1561">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1562">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1563">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1564">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1565">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1566">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1693">Numero civile uniforme Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1694">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1695">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1696">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1697">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1698">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1699">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1700">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1701">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1702">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1703">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1704">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1705">due cifre che corrispondono all'ordine di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1706">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso: una cifra pari per il maschio e una cifra dispari per la donna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1707">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1708">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1709">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1710">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1711">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1712">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1713">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1714">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1715">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1756">униформ граждански не</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1756">униформ граждански не</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1757">униформ граждански номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1757">униформ граждански номер</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1760">Numero di passaporto bulgaro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1761">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1762">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1763">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1764">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1765">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1766">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1767">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1768">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1769">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1770">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1771">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1772">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1773">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1774">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1794">Canada - Numero di conto corrente bancario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1795">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1796">7 o 12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1797">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1798">Un numero di conto corrente bancario canadese è di 7 o 12 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1799">Un numero di transito bancario canadese comprende:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1800">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1801">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1802">tre cifre OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1803">zero "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1804">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1805">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1806">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1807">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1808">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1809">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1810">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1811">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1812">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1813">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1814">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1838">Canada - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1839">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1840">Varia in base alla provincia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1841">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1842">Vari modelli per Alberta, Columbia Britannica, Manitoba, Nuovo Brunswick, Terranova e Labrador, Nuova Scozia, Ontario, Isola del Principe Edoardo, Quebec e Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1842">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1843">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1844">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1845">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1846">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1847">La funzione Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1847">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1848">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1848">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1849">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1849">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1985">Numero del servizio sanitario canadese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1985">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1986">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1986">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1987">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1987">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1988">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1989">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1989">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1990">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1990">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1992">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1993">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1994">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_health_service_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1994">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-1995">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_health_service_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-1995">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2007">Numero di passaporto canadese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2007">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2008">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2009">due lettere maiuscole seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2009">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2010">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2010">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2012">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2012">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2014">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2015">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2016">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_passport_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2016">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2017">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_canada_passport_number o Keyword_passport viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2017">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2047">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2047">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2048">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2048">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2049">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2049">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2050">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2050">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2051">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2051">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2052">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2053">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2053">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2055">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2055">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2056">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_phin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2056">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2057">Vengono trovate almeno due parole Keyword_canada_phin o Keyword_canada_provinces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2057">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2090">Canada - Numero di previdenza sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2090">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2091">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2092">nove cifre con trattini o spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2092">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2093">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2094">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2094">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2095">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2095">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2096">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2096">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2097">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2097">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2098">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2098">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2099">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2099">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2100">Non formattato: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2100">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2101">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2102">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2103">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2104">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2105">La funzione Func_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2105">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2106">Almeno due delle seguenti combinazioni:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2106">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2107">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2107">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2108">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2108">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2109">La funzione Func_eu_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2109">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2110">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2110">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2111">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2111">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2112">La funzione Func_unformatted_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2112">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2113">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2113">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2114">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2114">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2139">Numero di carta di identità cileno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2139">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2140">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2141">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori una cifra di controllo o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2141">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2142">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2143">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2143">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2144">da una a due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2144">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2145">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2145">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2146">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2146">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2147">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2147">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2148">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2148">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2149">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2149">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2150">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2150">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2151">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2152">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2153">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2154">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2155">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2155">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2156">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_chile_id_card parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2156">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2157">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2158">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2159">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2159">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2160">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2197">Numero di carta d'identità (PRC) residente in Cina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2197">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2198">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2199">18 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2199">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2200">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2201">18 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2201">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2202">sei cifre che sono un codice indirizzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2202">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2203">otto cifre nel formato AAAAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2203">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2204">tre cifre che sono un codice d'ordine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2204">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2205">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2205">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2206">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2207">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2207">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2208">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2209">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2209">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2210">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2210">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2211">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_china_resident_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2211">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2212">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2213">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2214">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2214">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2215">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2216">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2216">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2218">Carta d’identità per residenti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2218">Resident Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2221">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2221">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2222">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2222">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2223">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2223">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2224">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2224">鉴定</span></span>
