## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2228">Numero di carta di credito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2228">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2229">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2230">Da 14 a 16 cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate (dddddddd) e che devono superare il test Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2230">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2231">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2232">Modello complesso e affidabile che rileva le carte di tutte le principali marche in tutto il mondo, tra cui Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, carte regalo e carte da pranzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2232">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2233">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2234">Yes, il checksum Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2234">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2235">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2236">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2237">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2237">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2238">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2239">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_verification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2239">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2240">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2240">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2241">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2241">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2242">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2243">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2243">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2244">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2244">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2245">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2245">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2505">Croatia driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2505">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2506">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2507">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2507">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2508">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2509">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2509">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2510">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2511">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2512">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2513">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2514">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2514">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2515">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2515">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2639">Numero di carta d'identità della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2639">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2640">Questa entità del tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2641">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2641">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2642">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2643">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2643">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2644">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2645">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2645">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2646">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2647">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2648">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2649">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2650">La funzione Func_croatia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2650">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2651">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_croatia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2651">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2682">Numero di passaporto croato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2682">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2683">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2684">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2684">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2685">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2686">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2686">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2687">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2688">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2688">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2689">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2690">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2690">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2691">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2691">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2692">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2692">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2693">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2693">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2694">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2694">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2695">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2695">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2696">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2696">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2714">Numero di identificazione personale (OIB) della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2714">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2715">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2716">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2716">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2717">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2718">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2718">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2719">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2719">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2720">la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2720">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2721">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2722">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2723">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2724">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2725">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2725">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2726">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2726">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2727">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2728">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2728">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2729">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2729">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2730">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2730">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2761">Numero di licenza per i driver di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2761">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2762">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2763">12 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2763">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2764">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2765">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2765">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2766">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2767">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2768">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2769">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2770">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2770">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2771">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2781">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2781">driver lics</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2896">Carta d'identità di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2896">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2897">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2897">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2898">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2898">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2899">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2899">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2900">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2900">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2901">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2901">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2902">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2902">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2903">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2904">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2904">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2905">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2906">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2906">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2907">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2908">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2908">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2909">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2910">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2911">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2911">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2912">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2912">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2921">Numero di passaporto di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2921">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2922">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2923">una lettera seguita da 6-8 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2924">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2925">una lettera seguita da sei a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2926">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2927">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2928">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2929">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2929">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2930">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2931">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2932">L'espressione `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG/MM/AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2932">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2933">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2934">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2934">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2935">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2935">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2964">Codice fiscale di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2964">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2965">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2966">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2967">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2968">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2969">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2970">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2971">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2972">otto cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2972">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2973">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2974">otto cifre e una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2974">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2975">a "0" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2975">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2976">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2976">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2977">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2977">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2978">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2979">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2979">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2980">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2981">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2982">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2982">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2983">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2983">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2984">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2984">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-2985">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-2985">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3013">Numero di patente di guida ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3013">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3014">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3015">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3015">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3016">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3017">otto lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3017">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3018">lettera "E" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3018">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3019">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3019">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3020">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3020">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3021">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3021">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3022">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3023">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3023">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3024">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3025">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3026">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3026">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3027">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3153">Numero di passaporto ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3153">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3154">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3155">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3156">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3157">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3158">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3159">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3160">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3161">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3162">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3163">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3164">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3164">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3165">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3165">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3166">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3166">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3167">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3167">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3189">Numero di identità personale ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3189">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3190">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3191">nove cifre con barra facoltativa (formato precedente) 10 cifre con barra facoltativa (nuovo formato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3191">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3192">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3193">nove cifre (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3193">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3194">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3194">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3195">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3195">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3196">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3196">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3197">10 cifre (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3197">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3198">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3198">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3199">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3199">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3200">quattro cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3200">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3201">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3202">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3203">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3204">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3205">La funzione Func_czech_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3205">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3206">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_czech_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3206">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3207">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3208">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3208">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3209">La funzione Func_czech_id_card_new_format trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3209">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3210">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3257">Numero di patente di guida danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3257">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3258">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3259">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3259">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3260">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3261">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3261">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3262">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3263">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3263">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3264">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3265">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3266">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3266">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3267">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3267">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3391">Numero di passaporto danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3391">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3392">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3393">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3393">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3394">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3395">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3395">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3396">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3397">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3397">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3398">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3399">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3400">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3400">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3401">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3402">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date2` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AA o una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3402">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3403">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3404">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3404">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3405">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3405">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3425">Numero di identificazione personale Danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3425">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3426">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3427">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3427">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3428">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3429">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3429">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3430">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3430">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3431">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3431">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3432">quattro cifre in cui la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3432">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3433">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3434">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3435">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3436">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3437">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3437">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3438">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_denmark_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3438">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3439">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3440">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3440">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3441">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3441">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3442">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3442">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3514">Numero dea (Drug Enforcement Agency)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3514">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3515">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3516">due lettere seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3516">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3517">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3518">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3518">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3519">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) da questo set di lettere possibili: abcdefghjklmnprstux, che è un codice registrante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3519">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3520">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), ovvero la prima lettera del cognome o della cifra "9" del dichiarante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3520">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3521">sette cifre, l'ultima delle quali è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3521">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3522">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3523">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3523">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3524">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3525">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3525">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3526">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3526">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3527">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_dea_number` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3527">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3528">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3528">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3529">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3529">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3530">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3530">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3531">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3532">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3532">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3534">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3534">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3535">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3535">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3536">drug enforcement administration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3536">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3537">drug enforcement agency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3537">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3538">Numero di patente di guida estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3538">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3539">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3540">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3540">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3541">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3542">due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3542">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3543">le lettere "ET" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3543">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3544">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3544">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3545">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3546">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3546">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3547">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3548">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3548">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3549">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3549">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3550">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3550">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3676">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3676">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3677">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3678">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3679">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3680">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3681">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3682">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3683">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3684">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3684">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3685">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3686">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3687">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita (numero dispari maschile, numero pari femminile; 1-2: 19° secolo; 3-4: 20° secolo; 5-6: 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3687">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3688">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3688">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3689">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale che separa le persone nate nella stessa data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3689">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3690">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3690">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3691">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3692">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3693">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3694">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3695">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3695">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3696">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3696">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3697">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3698">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3698">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3731">Numero di passaporto estone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3731">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3732">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3733">una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3733">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3734">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3735">una lettera seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3735">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3736">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3737">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3738">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3739">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3739">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3740">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3740">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3741">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3742">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3742">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3743">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3743">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3744">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3744">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3745">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3745">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
