## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3763">Numero di carta di debito dell'Unione europea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3764">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3765">16 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3766">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3767">Modello complesso e affidabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3767">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3768">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3769">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3770">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3771">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3772">La funzione Func_eu_debit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3773">Si verifica almeno una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3774">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_eu_debit_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3775">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3776">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_security_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3777">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3778">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-3779">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-3779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4226">Numero di patente di guida finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4226">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4227">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4228">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4228">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4229">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4230">10 cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4230">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4231">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4232">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4233">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4234">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4234">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4235">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4236">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4236">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4237">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4238">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4239">L'espressione  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4239">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4240">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4240">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4371">Finlandia - Numero di assicurazione sanitaria europea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4371">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4372">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4373">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4374">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4375">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4376">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4377">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4378">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4379">Numero a 20 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4379">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4380">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4381">Numero a 20 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4381">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4382">10 cifre - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4382">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4383">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4383">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4384">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4384">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4385">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4386">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4386">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4387">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4388">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4389">L'espressione Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4389">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4390">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4390">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4408">Id nazionale Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4408">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4409">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4410">sei cifre più un carattere che indica un secolo più tre cifre più una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4410">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4411">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4412">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4412">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4413">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, che sono una data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4413">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4414">indicatore del secolo ('-', '+' o 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4414">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4415">Numero di identificazione personale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4415">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4416">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4416">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4417">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4418">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4419">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4420">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4421">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4421">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4422">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_finnish_national_id viene trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4422">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4423">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4423">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4424">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4425">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4425">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4426">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4426">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4475">Numero di passaporto finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4475">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4476">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4476">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4477">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4477">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4478">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4478">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4479">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4479">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4480">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4480">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4481">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4481">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4482">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4482">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4483">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4484">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4484">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4485">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4486">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4487">L'espressione `Regex_finland_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4487">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4488">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_finland_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4488">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4489">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4489">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4490">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4491">L'espressione `Regex_finland_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4491">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4492">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_finland_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4492">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4516">Francia - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4516">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4517">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4517">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4518">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4519">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4519">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4520">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4521">12 cifre con convalida per scontare modelli analoghi, ad esempio, quello dei numeri telefonici francesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4521">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4522">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4523">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4524">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4525">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4526">la funzione Func_french_drivers_license trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4526">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4527">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_french_drivers_license ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4527">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4658">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4659">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4660">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4661">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4662">Numero a 21 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4662">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4663">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4664">Numero a 21 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4664">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4665">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4665">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4666">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4667">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4667">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4668">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4669">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4669">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4670">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4671">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4671">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4672">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4673">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4674">l'espressione Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4674">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4675">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4675">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4681">Carta d'identità francese (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4681">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4682">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4683">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4684">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4685">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4685">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4686">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4687">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4688">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4689">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4689">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4690">L'espressione regolare Regex_france_cni restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4690">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4691">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4691">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4699">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4699">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4700">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4700">national identification number</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4705">Francia - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4705">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4706">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4706">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4707">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4707">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4708">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4709">nove cifre e lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4709">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4710">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4711">nove cifre e lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4711">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4712">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4712">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4713">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4713">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4714">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4714">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4715">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4716">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4717">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4718">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4719">La funzione `Func_fr_passport` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4719">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4720">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4720">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4721">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4721">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4722">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4723">La funzione `Func_fr_passport` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4723">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4724">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4724">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4725">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4725">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4742">passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4742">passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4743">passeportnon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4743">passeportnon</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4755">Numero di previdenza sociale francia (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4755">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4756">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4757">15 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4757">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4758">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4759">Deve corrispondere a uno di questi due modelli:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4759">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4760">13 cifre seguite da uno spazio seguito da due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4760">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4761">oppure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4761">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4762">15 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4762">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4763">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4764">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4765">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4766">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4766">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4767">La funzione `Func_french_insee` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4767">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4768">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_fr_insee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4768">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4769">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4770">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4770">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4771">La funzione Func_french_insee o Func_fr_insee trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4771">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4772">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4803">Numero di identificazione fiscale francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4803">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4804">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4805">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4805">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4806">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4807">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4807">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4808">Una cifra che deve essere 0, 1, 2 o 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4808">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4809">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4809">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4810">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4810">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4811">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4811">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4812">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4812">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4813">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4813">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4814">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4814">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4815">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4815">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4816">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4816">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4817">Tre cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4817">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4818">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4819">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4819">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4820">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4821">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4821">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4822">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4822">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4823">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4823">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4824">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4824">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4825">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4825">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4845">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto della Francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4845">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4846">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4846">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4847">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4847">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4848">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4848">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4849">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4849">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4850">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4850">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4851">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4851">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4852">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4853">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4853">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4854">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4855">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4855">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4856">due lettere - FR (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4856">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4857">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4857">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4858">due lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4858">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4859">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto, un trattino o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4859">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4860">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4860">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4861">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto, un trattino o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4861">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4862">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4862">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4863">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto, un trattino o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4863">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4864">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4864">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4865">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4866">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4867">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4868">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4868">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4869">La funzione Func_france_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4869">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4870">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4870">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4871">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4872">La funzione Func_france_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4872">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4885">Germania - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4885">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4886">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4886">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4887">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4887">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4888">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4889">combinazione di 11 cifre e lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4889">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4890">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4891">11 cifre e lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4891">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4892">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4892">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4893">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4893">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4894">sei cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4894">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4895">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4895">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4896">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4896">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4897">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4898">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4899">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4900">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4901">La funzione Func_german_drivers_license restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4901">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4902">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_german_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4902">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-4903">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-4903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5052">Numero carta d'identità Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5052">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5053">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5054">dal 1° novembre 2010: nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5054">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5055">dal 1° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010: 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5055">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5056">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5057">dal 1° novembre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5057">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5058">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5058">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5059">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5059">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5060">dal 1° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5060">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5061">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5061">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5062">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5063">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5064">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5065">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5065">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5066">L'espressione regolare Regex_germany_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5066">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5067">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_germany_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5067">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5083">Germania - Numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5083">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5084">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate numero di passaporto UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5084">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5085">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5086">10 cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5086">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5087">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5088">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5088">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5089">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5089">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5090">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5090">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5091">cinque cifre o lettere di questo set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5091">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5092">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5092">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5093">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5094">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5094">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5095">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5096">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5097">La funzione Func_german_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5097">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5098">Viene trovata una `Keyword_german_passport` parola chiave da o `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5098">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5099">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5099">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5100">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5100">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5101">La funzione Func_german_passport_data restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5101">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5102">Viene trovata una `Keyword_german_passport` parola chiave da o `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5102">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5103">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5103">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5126">Numero di identificazione fiscale Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5126">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5127">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5128">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5128">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5129">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5130">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5130">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5131">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5131">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5132">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5132">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5133">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5133">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5134">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5134">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5135">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5135">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5136">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5136">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5137">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5137">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5138">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5138">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5139">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5140">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5140">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5141">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5142">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5142">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5143">La funzione  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5143">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5144">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5145">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5145">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5146">La funzione  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5146">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5173">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5174">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5175">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5176">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5177">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5178">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5179">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5180">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5180">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5181">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5182">Motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5182">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5183">una lettera D o d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5183">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5184">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5184">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5185">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5185">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5186">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5186">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5187">uno spazio facoltativo o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5187">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5188">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5188">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5189">uno spazio facoltativo o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5189">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5190">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5191">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5192">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5192">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5193">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5194">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5195">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5195">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5196">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5196">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5197">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5197">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5198">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5198">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5199">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5199">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5200">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5200">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5201">partita IVA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5201">vat number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5208">Numero di patente di guida in Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5208">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5209">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5209">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5210">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5211">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5211">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5212">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5213">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5213">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5214">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5215">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5215">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5216">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5217">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5217">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5218">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5218">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5219">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5219">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
