## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5345">Carta d'identità nazionale della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5345">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5346">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5347">Combinazione di 7-8 lettere e numeri, oltre a un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5347">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5348">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5349">Sette lettere e numeri (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5349">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5350">Una lettera (qualsiasi lettera dell'alfabeto greco) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5350">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5351">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5351">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5352">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5352">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5353">Otto lettere e numeri (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5353">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5354">Due lettere in maiuscolo sia in alfabeto latino che greco (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5354">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5355">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5355">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5356">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5356">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5357">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5358">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5358">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5359">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5360">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5361">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5361">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5362">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_greece_id_card'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5362">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5363">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5363">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5364">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5364">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5365">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5365">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5366">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5366">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5367">greek id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5367">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5368">greek national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5368">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5369">carta d'identità greco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5369">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5370">id polizia greco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5370">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5371">carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5371">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5372">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5372">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5373">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5373">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5374">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5374">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5375">Numero di passaporto della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5375">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5376">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5377">Due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5377">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5378">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5379">Due lettere seguite da 7 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5379">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5380">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5381">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5381">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5382">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5383">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5384">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5384">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5385">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5386">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM AA (esempio - 28 agosto 19) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5386">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5387">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5388">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5389">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5390">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5390">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5394">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5394">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5395">passaporti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5395">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5396">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5396">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5398">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5398">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5399">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5399">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5400">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5400">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5401">numeri di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5401">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5402">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5402">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5403">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5403">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5404">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5404">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5405">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5405">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5406">Grecia - Numero di previdenza sociale (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5406">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5407">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5407">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5408">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5408">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5409">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5409">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5410">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5410">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5411">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5411">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5412">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5412">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5413">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5414">Undici cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5414">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5415">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5415">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5416">6 cifre come data di nascita AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5416">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5417">4 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5417">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5418">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5418">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5419">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5420">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5420">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5421">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5422">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5423">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5423">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5424">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5424">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5425">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5425">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5426">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5426">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5438">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5438">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5439">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5439">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5443">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5443">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5444">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5445">Nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5445">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5446">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5447">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5447">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5449">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5449">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5450">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5451">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5451">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5452">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5452">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5453">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5453">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5482">Numero della carta di identità (HKID) di Hong Kong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5482">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5483">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5484">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere e numeri. Facoltativamente, l’ultimo carattere può essere racchiuso tra parentesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5484">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5485">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5486">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5486">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5487">1-2 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5487">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5488">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5488">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5489">L'ultimo carattere (qualsiasi cifra o la lettera A), è rappresentato dal numero di controllo. Facoltativamente, può essere racchiuso tra parentesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5489">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5490">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5491">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5491">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5492">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5493">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5493">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5494">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5494">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5495">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_hong_kong_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5495">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5496">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5497">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5497">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5498">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5498">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5499">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5539">Numero di patente di guida ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5539">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5540">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5541">Due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5541">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5542">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5543">Due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5543">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5544">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5544">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5545">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5545">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5546">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5547">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5547">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5548">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5549">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5549">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5550">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5550">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5551">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5551">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5676">Numero di identificazione personale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5676">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5677">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5678">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5679">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5680">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5681">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5682">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5683">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5684">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5685">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5686">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5687">Una cifra che corrisponde al sesso (1-maschile, 2-femminile, altri numeri sono possibili anche per i cittadini nati prima del 1900 o i cittadini con doppia cittadinanza)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5687">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5688">Sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5688">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5689">Tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5689">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5690">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5690">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5691">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5692">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5693">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5694">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5695">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5695">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5696">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5696">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5697">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5698">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5698">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5701">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5701">id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5703">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5703">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5704">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5704">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5705">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5705">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5706">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5706">sz.ig.</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5709">Numero di passaporto ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5709">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5710">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5711">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5711">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5712">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5713">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5713">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5714">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5715">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5715">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5716">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5717">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5717">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5718">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5718">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5719">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5719">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5720">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5720">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5721">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5722">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5722">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5723">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5723">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5743">Codice di previdenza sociale ungherese (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5743">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5744">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5745">Nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5745">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5746">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5747">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5747">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5748">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5749">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5750">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5751">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5752">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5752">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5753">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5753">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5754">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5755">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5755">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5775">Numero di identificazione fiscale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5775">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5776">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5776">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5777">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5777">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5778">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5778">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5779">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5779">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5780">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5780">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5781">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5781">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5782">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5783">10 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5783">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5784">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5785">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5785">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5786">Una cifra che deve essere "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5786">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5787">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5787">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5788">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5788">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5789">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5790">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5791">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5792">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5792">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5793">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5793">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5794">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5794">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5795">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5795">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5796">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5796">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5822">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Ungheria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5822">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5823">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5824">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5825">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5826">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5827">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5828">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5829">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5830">Motivo alfanumerico a 10 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5830">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5831">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5832">Motivo alfanumerico a 10 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5833">due lettere - HU o hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5833">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5834">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5834">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5835">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5835">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5836">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5837">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5838">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5839">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5840">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5840">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5841">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5841">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5842">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5842">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5843">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5843">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5844">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5844">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5845">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5845">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5857">India - Numero di account permanente (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5857">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5858">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5859">10 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5859">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5860">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5861">10 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5861">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5862">Tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5862">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5863">Lettera in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5863">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5864">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5864">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5865">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5865">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5866">Una lettera che è una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5866">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5867">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5868">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5869">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5870">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5870">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5871">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5871">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5872">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_permanent_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5872">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5873">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5873">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5874">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5874">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5879">India - Numero di identificazione univoca (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5879">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5880">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5881">12 cifre contenenti spazi o trattini facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5881">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5882">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5883">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5883">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5884">Una cifra che non è 0 o 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5884">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5885">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5885">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5886">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5886">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5887">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5887">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5888">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5889">La cifra finale, che è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5889">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5890">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5891">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5892">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5893">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5894">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5894">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5895">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_aadhar da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5895">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5896">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5896">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5897">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5897">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5898">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5898">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5899">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5908">Numero della carta di identità indonesiana (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5908">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5909">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5910">16 cifre contenenti punti facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5910">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5911">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5912">16 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5912">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5913">Codice provincia a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5913">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5914">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5914">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5915">Codice città o area a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5915">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5916">Codice sotto-distretto a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5916">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5917">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5917">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5918">Sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5918">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5919">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5920">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5920">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5921">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5922">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5923">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5924">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5924">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5925">L'espressione regolare Regex_indonesia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5925">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5926">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_indonesia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5926">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5927">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5927">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5932">Numero di conto bancario internazionale (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5932">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5933">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5934">Codice paese (due lettere) più cifre di controllo (due cifre) più numero bban (fino a 30 caratteri)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5934">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5935">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5936">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5936">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5937">Codice paese a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5937">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5938">Due cifre di controllo (seguite da uno spazio facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5938">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5939">1-7 gruppi di quattro lettere o cifre (possono essere separati da spazi)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5939">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5940">1-3 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5940">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5941">Il formato per ogni paese è leggermente diverso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5941">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5942">Il tipo di informazioni riservate IBAN riguarda questi 60 paesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5942">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, si sk , sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5945">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5946">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5947">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5948">La funzione Func_iban restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5948">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5949">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5949">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5953">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5954">Dizionario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5954">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5955">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5956">Parola chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5956">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5957">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5958">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5959">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5960">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5960">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5961">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_10_updated parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5961">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5962">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_10_codes da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5962">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5963">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5963">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5964">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_10_ viene aggiornata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5964">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5965">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5966">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario Dictionary_icd_10_updated parole chiave, basato sulla classificazione internazionale delle malattie, decima revisione, modifica clinica [(ICD-10-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5966">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5967">Questo tipo cerca solo il termine e non i codici di assicurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5967">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5968">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario Dictionary_icd_10_codes parole chiave, basato sulla classificazione internazionale delle malattie, decima revisione, modifica clinica [(ICD-10-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5968">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5969">Questo tipo cerca solo i codici di assicurazione, non la descrizione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5969">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5976">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5977">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5978">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5979">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_9_updated da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5979">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5980">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_9_codes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5980">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5981">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5982">Viene trovata una parola Dictionary_icd_9_updated da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5982">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
