```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5983">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5983">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5984">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario Dictionary_icd_9_updated parole chiave, basato sulla classificazione internazionale delle malattie, nona revisione, modifica clinica [(ICD-9-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5984">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5985">Questo tipo cerca solo il termine e non i codici di assicurazione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5985">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5986">Qualsiasi termine del dizionario Dictionary_icd_9_codes parole chiave, basato sulla classificazione internazionale delle malattie, nona revisione, modifica clinica [(ICD-9-CM).](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5986">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5987">Questo tipo cerca solo i codici di assicurazione, non la descrizione.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5987">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5988">Indirizzo IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5988">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5989">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5989">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5990">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5990">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5991">Modello complesso che rappresenta le versioni formattate (punti) e non formattate (senza punti) degli indirizzi IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5991">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5992">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5992">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5993">Modello complesso che rappresenta i numeri IPv6 formattati (che includono i due punti)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5993">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5994">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5994">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5995">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5996">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5997">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5998">Per IPv6, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5998">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-5999">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-5999">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6000">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6000">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6001">Per IPv4, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6001">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6002">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv4_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6002">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6003">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6003">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6004">Per IPv6, un criterio DLP ha una probabilità elevata di aver rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6004">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6005">L'espressione regolare Regex_ipv6_address restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6005">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6006">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6006">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6007">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6007">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6008">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6008">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6009">IP (questa parola chiave fa distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6009">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6010">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6010">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6011">Indirizzi IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6011">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6012">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6012">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6013">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6013">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6014">Numero di patente di guida in Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6014">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6015">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6016">Sei cifre seguite da quattro lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6016">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6017">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6018">Sei cifre e quattro lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6018">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6019">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6019">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6020">Quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6020">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6021">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6022">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6023">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6024">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6025">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6025">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6026">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6150">Numero di passaporto dell'Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6150">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6151">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6152">Due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6152">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6153">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6154">Due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6154">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6155">Due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6155">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6156">Sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6156">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6157">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6158">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6159">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6160">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6161">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6161">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6162">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6163">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 01 BEA/MAGGIO 1988) o viene trovata una parola chiave da `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6163">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6164">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6165">L'espressione  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6165">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6166">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6190">Numero del servizio pubblico personale (PPS) dell'Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6190">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6191">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6192">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6192">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6193">sette cifre seguite da 1-2 lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6193">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6194">Nuovo formato (1 gennaio 2013 e dopo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6194">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6195">sette cifre seguite da due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6195">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6196">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6197">Formato precedente (fino al 31 dicembre 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6197">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6198">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6198">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6199">da una a due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6199">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6200">Nuovo formato (1 gennaio 2013 e dopo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6200">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6201">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6201">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6202">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) che è una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6202">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6203">Lettera facoltativa nell'intervallo A-I o "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6203">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6204">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6205">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6206">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6207">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6208">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6209">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6209">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6210">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6211">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6211">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6212">La funzione Func_ireland_pps trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6212">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6213">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6258">Numero di conto corrente bancario Israele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6258">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6259">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6260">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6260">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6261">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6262">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6262">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6263">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6263">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6264">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6264">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6265">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6265">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6266">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6266">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6267">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6267">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6268">Non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6268">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6269">13 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6269">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6270">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6271">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6272">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6273">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6273">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6274">L'espressione regolare Regex_israel_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6274">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6275">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_israel_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6275">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6276">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6276">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6279">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6279">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6280">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6280">Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6282">Numero di identificazione nazionale Israele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6282">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6283">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6284">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6285">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6286">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6286">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6287">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6288">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6288">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6289">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6290">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6291">La funzione Func_israeli_national_id_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6291">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6292">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Israel_National_ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6292">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6293">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6293">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6312">Numero di patente di guida italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6312">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6313">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6313">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6314">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6315">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6315">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6316">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6317">una combinazione di 10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6317">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6318">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6318">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6319">la lettera "A" o "V" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6319">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6320">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6321">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6321">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6322">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6323">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6324">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6325">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6326">L'espressione `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6326">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6327">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6327">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6454">Codice fiscale italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6454">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6455">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6455">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6456">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6456">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6457">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6457">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6458">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6458">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6459">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6459">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6460">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6460">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6461">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6462">una combinazione di 16 caratteri di lettere e cifre nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6462">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6463">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6464">Una combinazione di 16 caratteri di lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6464">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6465">tre lettere che corrispondono alle prime tre consonanti nel nome della famiglia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6465">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6466">tre lettere che corrispondono alla prima, alla terza e alla quarta consonanti nel nome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6466">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6467">due cifre che corrispondono alle ultime cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6467">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6468">una lettera che corrisponde alla lettera del mese di nascita: le lettere vengono utilizzate in ordine alfabetico, ma vengono utilizzate solo le lettere da A a E, H, L, M, P, R a T (quindi, gennaio è A e ottobre è R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6468">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6469">due cifre che corrispondono al giorno del mese di nascita: per distinguere i sessi, vengono aggiunti 40 al giorno di nascita per le donne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6469">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6470">quattro cifre che corrispondono al codice di area specifico del comune in cui è nata la persona (i codici a livello nazionale vengono utilizzati per i paesi esterni)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6470">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6471">una cifra di parità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6471">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6472">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6473">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6473">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6474">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6475">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6475">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6476">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6476">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6477">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6477">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6478">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6479">La funzione  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6479">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6480">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6480">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6514">Numero di passaporto italiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6514">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6515">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6516">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6516">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6517">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6518">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6518">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6519">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6519">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6520">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6520">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6521">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6522">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6522">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6523">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6524">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6524">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6525">L'espressione  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6525">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6526">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6526">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6527">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6527">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6528">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6528">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6529">L'espressione  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6529">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6530">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6530">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6554">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6554">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6555">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6556">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6557">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6558">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6559">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6560">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6561">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6562">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6562">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6563">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6564">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri con delimitatori facoltativi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6564">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6565">I o i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6565">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6566">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6566">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6567">spazio facoltativo, punto, trattino o virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6567">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6568">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6568">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6569">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6570">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6570">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6571">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6572">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6572">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6573">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6573">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6574">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6574">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6575">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6575">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6576">La funzione Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6576">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6584">Numero di conto corrente bancario giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6584">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6585">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6586">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6586">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6587">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6588">numero di conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6588">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6589">sette o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6589">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6590">codice filiale del conto corrente bancario:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6590">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6591">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6591">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6592">uno spazio o un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6592">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6593">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6593">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6594">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6595">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6595">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6596">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6597">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6598">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6598">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6599">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6599">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6600">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6600">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6601">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6601">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6602">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6602">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6603">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6603">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6604">La funzione Func_jp_bank_account restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6604">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6605">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6605">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6652">Numero di patente di guida giapponese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6652">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6653">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6654">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6654">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6655">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6656">12 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6656">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6657">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6658">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6659">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6660">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6660">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6661">La funzione Func_jp_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6661">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6662">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6662">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6700">Giappone Il mio numero - Corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6701">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6701">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6702">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6702">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6703">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6703">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6704">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6704">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6705">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6705">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6706">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6706">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6707">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6707">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6708">Numero a 13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6708">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6709">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6710">Numero a 13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6710">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6711">una cifra da una a nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6711">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6712">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6712">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6713">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6714">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6715">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6716">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6716">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6717">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6717">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6718">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6718">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6719">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6719">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6720">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6720">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6736">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6736">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6737">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6737">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6738">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6738">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6739">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6739">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6740">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6741">Numero a 12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6741">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6742">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6743">Numero a 12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6743">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6745">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6745">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6746">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6746">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6747">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6747">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6748">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6748">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6749">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6749">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6750">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6750">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6751">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6751">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6752">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6752">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6753">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_personal trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6753">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6754">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6754">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6755">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6755">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6756">La funzione Func_japanese_my_number_personal trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6756">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6764">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6764">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6769">Numero di passaporto giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6769">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6770">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6771">due lettere seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6771">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6772">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6773">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6773">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6774">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6775">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6775">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6776">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6777">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6777">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6778">La funzione Func_jp_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6778">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6779">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6779">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6796">Numero di carta di residenza giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6796">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6797">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6798">12 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6798">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6799">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6800">12 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6800">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6801">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6801">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6802">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6802">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6803">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6803">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6804">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6805">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6806">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6807">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6808">L'espressione regolare Regex_jp_residence_card_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6808">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6809">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_jp_residence_card_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6813">Carta di residenza no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6813">Residence card no</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6818">Numero di registrazione residente in Giappone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6818">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6819">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6820">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6820">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6821">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6822">11 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6822">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6823">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6824">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6824">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6825">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6826">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6826">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6827">La funzione Func_jp_resident_registration_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6827">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6828">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6828">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6829">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6829">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6833">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6833">Resident Registration No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6835">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6835">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6837">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6837">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6838">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6838">証明書番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6841">Giappone - Numero di previdenza sociale (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6841">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6842">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6843">7-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6843">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6844">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6845">7-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6845">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6846">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6846">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6847">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6847">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6848">sei cifre OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6848">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6849">7-12 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6849">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6850">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6851">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6851">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6852">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6853">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6854">La funzione Func_jp_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6854">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6855">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6855">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6856">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6857">La funzione Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6857">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6858">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6870">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6870">社会保険番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6871">社会保険No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6871">社会保険No.</span></span>
