- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6874">介護保険被保険者番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6874">介護保険被保険者番号</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6879">Numero di patente lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6879">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6880">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6881">tre lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6881">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6882">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6883">tre lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6883">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6884">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6884">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6885">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6885">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6886">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6887">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6888">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6889">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6890">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6890">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6891">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6891">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6892">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6892">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6893">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6893">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6896">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6896">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6897">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6897">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6898">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6898">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-6899">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-6899">driverlicences</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7016">Codice personale Lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7016">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7017">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7018">11 cifre e un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7018">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7019">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7020">Formato precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7020">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7021">11 cifre e un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7021">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7022">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7022">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7023">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7023">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7024">una cifra che corrisponde al secolo di nascita ("0" per il 19° secolo, "1" per il 20° secolo e "2" per il 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7024">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7025">quattro cifre generate in modo casuale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7025">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7026">Nuovo formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7026">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7027">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7027">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7028">Due cifre "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7028">Two digits "32"</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7032">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7032">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7033">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7033">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7034">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7034">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7035">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7035">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7036">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7037">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7037">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7100">Numero di passaporto lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7100">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7101">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7102">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7102">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7103">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7104">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7104">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7105">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7105">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7106">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7106">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7107">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7108">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7109">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7110">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7111">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7111">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7112">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7113">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7113">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7114">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7115">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7116">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7139">Numero di patente di guida lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7139">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7140">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7141">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7141">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7142">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7143">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7143">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7144">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7144">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7145">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7145">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7146">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7146">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7147">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7148">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7148">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7149">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7149">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7274">Codice personale Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7274">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7275">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7275">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7276">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7276">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7277">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7277">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7278">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7278">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7279">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7279">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7280">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7280">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7281">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7282">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7282">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7283">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7284">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7284">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7285">una cifra (da 1 a 6) che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita della persona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7285">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7286">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7286">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7287">tre cifre che corrispondono al numero seriale della data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7287">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7288">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7288">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7289">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7290">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7291">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7292">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7292">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7293">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7293">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7294">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7294">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7295">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7295">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7296">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7296">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7331">Numero di passaporto lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7331">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7332">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7333">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7333">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7334">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7335">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7335">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7336">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7337">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7337">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7338">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7339">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7339">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7340">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7340">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7341">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7342">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7342">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7343">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7343">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7344">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7344">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7345">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7345">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7346">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7346">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7347">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7347">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7348">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7348">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7349">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7349">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7350">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7350">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7351">passaporti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7351">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7352">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7352">passportno</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7365">Numero di patente di guida di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7365">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7366">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7367">sei cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7367">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7368">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7369">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7369">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7370">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7371">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7372">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7373">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7373">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7374">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7374">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7375">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7499">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Lussemburgo (persone fisiche)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7500">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7500">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7501">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7501">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7502">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7502">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7503">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7503">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7504">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7504">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7505">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7505">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7506">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7507">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7507">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7508">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7509">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7509">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7510">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7510">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7511">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7511">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7512">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7513">sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7513">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7514">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7515">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7516">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7517">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7518">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7519">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7542">Numero di passaporto di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7542">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7543">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7544">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7544">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7545">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7546">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7546">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7547">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7548">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7549">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7550">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7550">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7551">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7551">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7552">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7552">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7553">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7553">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7554">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7554">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7555">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7555">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7556">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7556">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7588">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Luxemburg (persone non naturali)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7588">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7589">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7589">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7590">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7590">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7591">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7591">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7592">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7592">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7593">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7594">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7594">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7595">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7595">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7596">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7596">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7597">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7597">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7598">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7598">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7599">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7599">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7600">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7600">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7601">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7602">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7603">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7604">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7604">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7605">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7605">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7606">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7606">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7607">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7607">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7608">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7608">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7648">Numero di carta di identità malese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7648">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7649">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7650">12 cifre contenenti lineette facoltative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7650">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7651">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7652">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7652">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7653">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7653">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7654">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7654">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7655">Codice luogo di nascita a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7655">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7656">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7656">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7657">tre cifre casuali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7657">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7658">codice di genere a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7658">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7659">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7660">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7661">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7662">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7663">L'espressione regolare Regex_malaysia_id_card_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7663">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7664">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7664">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7691">Numero di patente di guida di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7691">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7692">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7693">Combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7693">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7694">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7695">combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7695">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7696">due caratteri (cifre o lettere, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7696">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7697">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7697">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7698">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7698">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7699">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7699">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7700">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7700">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7701">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7702">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7702">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7703">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7704">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7705">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7706">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7830">Numero di carta d'identità di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7830">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7831">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7832">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7833">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7834">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7835">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7836">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7837">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7838">sette cifre seguite da una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7838">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7839">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7840">sette cifre seguite da una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7840">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7841">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7841">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7842">una lettera in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7842">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7843">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7844">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7844">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7845">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7846">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7847">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7848">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7849">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7849">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7850">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7850">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7861">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7861">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7867">Numero di passaporto di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7867">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7868">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7869">sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7869">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7870">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7871">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7871">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7872">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7873">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7874">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7875">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7876">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7876">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7877">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7877">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7878">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7878">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7879">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7880">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7880">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7881">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7881">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7901">Numero di identificazione fiscale di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7901">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7902">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7903">Per i cittadini maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7903">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7904">sette cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7904">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7905">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7905">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7906">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7906">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7907">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7908">Nazionali maltesi: sette cifre e una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7908">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7909">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7909">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7910">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7910">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7911">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7911">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7912">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7912">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7913">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7914">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7914">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7915">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7916">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7916">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7917">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7917">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7918">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7918">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7919">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7919">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7920">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7920">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
