## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7953">Carta MBI (Medicare Beneficiary Identifier)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7954">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7955">formato alfanumerico di undici caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7955">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7956">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7956">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7957">una cifra compresa tra 1 e 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7957">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7958">una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7958">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7959">una cifra o una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7959">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7960">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7960">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7961">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7961">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7962">una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7962">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7963">una cifra o una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7963">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7964">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7964">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7965">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7965">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7966">due lettere escluse S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7966">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7967">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7967">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7968">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7969">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7969">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7970">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7971">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7971">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7972">L'espressione  `Regex_mbi_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7972">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7973">Viene trovata una parola  `Keyword_mbi_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7973">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7974">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7974">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7975">L'espressione  `Regex_mbi_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7975">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7976">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7976">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7978">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7978">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7979">mbi #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7979">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7980">medicare beneficiario #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7980">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7981">identificatore del beneficiario medicare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7981">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7982">medicare beneficiario no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7982">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7983">medicare numero beneficiario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7983">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7984">medicare beneficiario #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7984">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7985">Codice CURP (Unique Population Registry Code) del Messico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7986">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7987">Motivo alfanumerico a 18 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7987">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7988">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7988">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7989">quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7989">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7990">sei cifre che indicano una data valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7990">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7991">una lettera - H/h o M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7991">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7992">due lettere che indicano un codice di stato messicano valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7992">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7993">tre lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7993">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7994">una lettera o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7994">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7995">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7995">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7996">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7996">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7997">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7997">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7998">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7998">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-7999">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-7999">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8000">La funzione  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8000">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8001">Viene trovata una parola  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8001">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8002">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8002">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8003">La funzione  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8003">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8004">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8004">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mexico_population_registry_code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8005">Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8005">Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8006">Clave Única de Registro de Población</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8006">Clave Única de Registro de Población</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8007">Clave Unica de Registro de Poblacion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8007">Clave Unica de Registro de Poblacion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8008">Codice del Registro di sistema del popolamento univoco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8008">Unique Population Registry Code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8009">codice di popolazione univoco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8009">unique population code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8010">CURP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8010">CURP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8011">ID personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8011">Personal ID</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8024">Numero BSN (Netherlands citizen's service)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8024">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8025">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8026">otto o nove cifre contenenti spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8026">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8027">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8028">otto-nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8028">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8029">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8029">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8030">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8030">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8031">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8031">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8032">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8032">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8033">due-tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8033">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8034">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8035">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8036">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8037">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8037">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8038">La funzione Func_netherlands_bsn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8038">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8039">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_netherlands_bsn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8039">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8040">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8040">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8064">Numero di patente olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8064">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8065">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8066">dieci cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8066">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8067">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8068">dieci cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8068">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8069">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8070">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8070">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8071">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8072">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8073">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8073">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8074">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8074">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8202">Numero di passaporto olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8202">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8203">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8204">nove lettere o cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8204">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8205">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8206">nove lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8206">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8207">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8208">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8208">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8209">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8210">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8210">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8211">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8211">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8212">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8212">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8213">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8213">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8214">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8215">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8215">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8216">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8216">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8243">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8244">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8244">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8247">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8248">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8249">La funzione  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8249">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8250">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8250">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8251">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8251">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8252">La funzione  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8252">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8292">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8292">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8296">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8296">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8297">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8298">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8298">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8299">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8300">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8300">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8301">N o n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8301">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8302">L o l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8302">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8303">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8303">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8304">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8304">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8305">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8305">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8306">B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8306">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8307">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8307">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8308">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8309">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8310">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8311">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8311">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8312">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8312">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8313">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8313">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8314">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8314">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8315">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8315">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8331">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8331">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8341">da due a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8341">two to three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8343">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8343">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8345">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8346">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8347">La funzione Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8347">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8349">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>

      </Entity>
```

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8463">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8464">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8464">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8465">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8465">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8466">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8466">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8467">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8468">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8468">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8477">Numero del ministero della sanità della Nuova Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8477">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8478">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8479">tre lettere, uno spazio (facoltativo) e quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8479">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8480">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8480">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8481">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) tranne "I" e "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8481">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8482">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8482">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8483">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8483">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8484">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8485">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8486">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8487">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8488">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8488">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8489">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_nz_terms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8489">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8490">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8491">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8492">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8492">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8493">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8508">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8508">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8509">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8509">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8510">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8510">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8511">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8511">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8512">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8512">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8513">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8513">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8514">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8514">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8516">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8517">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8517">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8518">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8518">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8519">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8519">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8520">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8520">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8521">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8521">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8522">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8522">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8523">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8524">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8525">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8526">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8526">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8527">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8527">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8528">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8528">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8529">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8530">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8530">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8538">Numero di identificazione norvegia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8538">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8539">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8540">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8540">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8541">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8542">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8542">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8543">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8543">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8544">numero individuale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8544">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8545">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8545">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8546">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8547">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8547">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8548">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8549">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8549">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8550">La funzione Func_norway_id_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8550">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8551">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_norway_id_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8551">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8552">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8553">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8553">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8554">La funzione Func_norway_id_numbe trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8554">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8555">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8556">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8556">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8557">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8557">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8560">Numero ID
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8560">ID Number</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8564">Numero di identificazione multivalore unificato delle Filippine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8564">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8565">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8566">12 cifre separate da dei segni meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8566">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8567">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8568">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8568">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8569">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8569">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8570">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8570">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8571">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8571">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8572">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8572">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8573">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8573">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8574">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8575">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8575">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8576">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8577">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8577">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8578">L'espressione regolare Regex_philippines_unified_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8578">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8579">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_philippines_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8579">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8580">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8580">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8582">ID multifunzione unificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8583">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8583">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8584">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8584">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8586">Numero di patente di guida polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8586">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8587">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8588">14 cifre contenenti due barre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8588">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8589">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8590">14 cifre e due barre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8590">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8591">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8591">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8592">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8592">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8593">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8594">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8594">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8595">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8595">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8596">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8597">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8598">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8599">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8600">L'espressione  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8600">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8601">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8601">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8725">Carta di identità polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8725">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8726">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8727">tre lettere e sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8727">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8728">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8729">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8729">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8730">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8731">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8732">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8733">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8734">La funzione Func_polish_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8734">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8735">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8735">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8736">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8737">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8737">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8738">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8738">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8742">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8742">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8743">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8743">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8744">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8744">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8747">ID nazionale Polonia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8747">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8748">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8749">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8749">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8750">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8750">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8751">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita nel formato AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8751">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8752">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8752">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8753">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8753">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8754">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8755">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8755">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8756">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8757">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8757">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8758">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8758">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8759">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_pesel_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8759">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8760">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8760">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8761">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8761">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8762">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8762">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8763">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8764">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8764">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8767">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8767">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8768">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8768">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8771">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8771">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8772">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8772">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8775">Numero di passaporto polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8775">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8776">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8776">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8777">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8777">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8778">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8779">due lettere e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8779">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8780">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8781">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8781">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8782">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8783">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8783">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8784">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8785">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8785">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8786">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8787">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8788">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8788">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8789">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8790">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8791">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8791">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8792">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8792">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8793">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8793">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8794">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8795">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8795">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8796">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8822">Numero REGON Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8822">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8823">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8824">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8825">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8826">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8827">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8828">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8829">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8832">numero a nove cifre o a 14 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8832">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8833">nove cifre o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8833">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8834">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8834">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8835">trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8835">hyphen</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8838">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8839">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8840">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8841">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8841">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8842">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_polish_regon_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8842">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8843">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8843">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8844">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8844">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8862">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8863">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8864">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8864">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8866">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8866">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8867">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8868">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8873">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8874">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8875">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8877">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8907">Numero di carta di cittadinanza portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8907">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8908">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8909">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8910">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8911">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8911">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8912">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8913">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8914">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8915">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8916">L'espressione regolare Regex_portugal_citizen_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8916">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8917">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_portugal_citizen_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8917">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
