## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8937">Numero di patente di guida portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8937">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8938">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8939">due modelli - due lettere seguite da 5-8 cifre con caratteri speciali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8939">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8940">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8941">Modello 1: due lettere seguite da 5/6 con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8941">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8942">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8942">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8943">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8943">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8944">Cinque o sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8944">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8945">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8945">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8946">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8946">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8947">Modello 2: una lettera seguita da 6/8 cifre con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8947">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8948">Una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8948">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8949">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8949">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8950">Sei o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8950">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8951">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8951">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8952">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8952">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8953">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8953">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8954">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8954">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8955">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8955">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8956">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8956">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8957">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8957">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-8958">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-8958">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9090">Numero di passaporto portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9090">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9091">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9092">una lettera seguita da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9092">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9093">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9094">una lettera seguita da sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9094">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9095">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9095">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9096">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9096">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9097">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9098">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9098">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9099">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9100">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9100">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9101">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9101">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9102">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9102">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9103">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9103">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9104">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9105">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9105">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9106">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9106">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9133">Numero di identificazione fiscale del Portogallo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9133">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9134">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9135">nove cifre con spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9135">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9136">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9137">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9137">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9138">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9138">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9139">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9139">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9140">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9140">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9141">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9141">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9142">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9143">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9144">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9145">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9146">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9146">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9147">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9147">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9148">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9148">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9149">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9149">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9174">Numero di patente di guida romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9174">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9175">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9176">un carattere seguito da otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9176">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9177">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9178">un carattere seguito da otto cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9178">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9179">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9179">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9180">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9180">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9181">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9182">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9183">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9184">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9185">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9185">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9186">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9314">Codice numerico personale Romania (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9314">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9315">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9315">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9316">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9316">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9317">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9317">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9318">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9318">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9319">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9319">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9320">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9320">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9321">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9322">13 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9322">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9323">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9323">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9324">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9324">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9325">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9325">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9326">due cifre, che possono essere 01-52 o 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9326">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9327">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9328">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9329">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9329">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9330">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9331">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9331">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9332">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9332">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9333">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9333">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9334">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9335">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9335">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9386">Numero di passaporto romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9386">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9387">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9388">otto o nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9388">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9389">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9390">otto o nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9390">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9391">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9392">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9393">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9394">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9395">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9395">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9396">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9397">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio- 01 FEB/FEB 10) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9397">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9398">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9399">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9399">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9400">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9419">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9420">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9421">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9422">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9423">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9424">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9425">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9426">Numero a 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9426">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9427">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9428">Numero a 10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9428">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9429">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9429">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9430">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9430">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9431">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9431">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9432">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9432">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9433">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9433">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9434">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9434">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9435">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9435">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9436">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9437">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9438">L'espressione Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9438">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9439">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9439">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9459">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9459">communication compliance policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9463">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9463">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9464">numero a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9464">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9465">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9465">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9466">numero a nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9466">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9467">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9467">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9468">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9468">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9469">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9469">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9470">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9471">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9472">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9473">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9473">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9474">L'espressione Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9474">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9475">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9475">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9492">Arabia Saudita - Identificativo nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9492">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9493">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9494">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9494">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9495">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9496">10 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9496">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9497">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9498">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9498">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9499">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9500">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9501">L'espressione regolare Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9501">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9502">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9502">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9509">Numero NRIC (National Registration Identity Card) di Singapore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9509">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9510">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9511">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9511">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9512">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9512">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9513">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9513">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9514">la lettera "F", "G", "S" o "T" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9514">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9515">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9515">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9516">una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9516">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9517">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9518">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9519">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9520">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9521">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9521">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9522">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_singapore_nric.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9522">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9523">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9524">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9525">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9525">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9526">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9528">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9528">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9531">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9531">NRIC</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9537">Numero di patente di guida slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9537">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9538">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9539">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9539">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9540">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9541">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9541">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9542">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9542">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9543">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9543">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9544">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9545">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9546">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9547">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9547">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9548">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9548">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9549">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9682">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9683">nove o dieci cifre contenenti barra rovesciata facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9683">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9684">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9684">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9685">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9685">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9686">barra facoltativa (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9686">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9687">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9687">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9688">una cifra di controllo facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9688">one optional check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9690">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9691">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9692">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9692">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9693">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9693">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9694">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9694">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9695">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9695">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9696">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9696">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9743">Numero di passaporto slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9743">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9744">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9745">una cifra o una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9745">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9746">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9747">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9747">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9748">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9749">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9750">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9751">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9752">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9752">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9753">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9754">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9755">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9756">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9756">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9757">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9779">Numero di patente di guida slovena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9779">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9780">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9781">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9781">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9782">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9783">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9783">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9784">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9785">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9785">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9786">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9787">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9787">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9788">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9788">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9789">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9789">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9920">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9920">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9921">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9921">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9922">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9922">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9923">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9924">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9924">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9925">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9925">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9926">13 cifre nel modello specificato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9926">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9927">sette cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMLLL), dove "LLL" corrisponde alle ultime tre cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9927">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9928">due cifre che corrispondono all'area di nascita "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9928">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9929">tre cifre che corrispondono a una combinazione di sesso e numero di serie per le persone nate nello stesso giorno (000-499 per gli uomini e 500-999 per le donne)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9929">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9930">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9930">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9931">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9932">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9932">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9933">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9934">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9934">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9935">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9935">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9936">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9936">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9937">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9937">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9938">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9938">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9966">Numero di passaporto slovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9966">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9967">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9968">due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9969">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9970">due lettere seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9971">la lettera "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9972">una lettera maiuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9973">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9974">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9975">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9976">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9977">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9978">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9979">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9979">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9980">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9980">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9981">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9982">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9982">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-9983">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10006">Numero di identificazione fiscale Slovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10006">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10007">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10008">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10009">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10010">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10011">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10012">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10013">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10014">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10014">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10015">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10015">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10016">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10016">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10017">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10017">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10018">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10018">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10019">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10020">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10020">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10021">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10022">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10023">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10023">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10024">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10024">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10025">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10025">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10026">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10026">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
