## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10050">Numero di identificazione sudafricano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10050">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10051">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10052">13 cifre che possono contenere spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10052">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10053">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10054">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10054">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10055">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10055">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10056">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10056">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10057">indicatore di cittadinanza a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10057">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10058">la cifra "8" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10058">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10059">una cifra, ovvero una cifra di checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10059">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10060">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10061">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10062">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10063">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10064">La funzione Func_south_africa_identification_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10064">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10065">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_south_africa_identification_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10065">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10066">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10067">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10067">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10068">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10068">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10069">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10069">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10070">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10070">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10071">Identificazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10071">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10072">South Korea resident registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10072">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10073">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10074">13 cifre contenenti un segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10074">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10075">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10076">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10076">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10077">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10077">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10078">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10078">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10079">una cifra determinata dal secolo e dal sesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10079">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10080">Codice paese di nascita a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10080">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10081">una cifra utilizzata per distinguere le persone per le quali i numeri precedenti sono identici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10081">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10082">una cifra di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10082">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10083">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10084">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10085">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10086">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10087">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10087">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10088">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_south_korea_resident_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10088">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10089">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10089">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10090">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10091">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10091">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10092">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10092">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10093">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10093">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10095">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10095">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10096">Numero di registrazione del cittadino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10096">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10097">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10097">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10098">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10098">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10099">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10099">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10100">Numero di patente di guida in Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10100">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10101">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10102">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10102">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10103">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10104">otto cifre seguite da un carattere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10104">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10105">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10105">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10106">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10106">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10107">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10108">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10108">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10109">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10110">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10111">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10111">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10112">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10113">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10113">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10114">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10114">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10246">licencia de manejo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10246">licencia de manejo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10247">licencia manejo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10247">licencia manejo</span></span>

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10248">Spagna DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10248">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10249">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10249">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10250">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10250">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10251">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10251">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10252">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10252">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10253">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10253">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10254">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10254">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10255">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10256">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10256">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10257">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10258">sette cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10258">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10259">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10259">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10260">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10260">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10261">una lettera di controllo (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10261">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10262">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10263">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10263">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10264">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10265">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10265">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10266">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10266">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10267">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10267">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10268">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10268">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10269">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10269">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10293">Numero di passaporto spagnolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10293">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10294">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10295">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10295">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10296">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10297">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10297">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10298">due cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10298">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10299">una cifra o una lettera (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10299">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10300">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10300">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10301">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10302">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10302">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10303">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10304">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10305">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10305">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10306">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10306">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10307">L'espressione `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG-MM-AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10307">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10308">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10309">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10309">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10310">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10311">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10311">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10339">Spagna - Numero di previdenza sociale (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10339">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10340">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10341">11-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10341">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10342">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10343">11-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10343">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10344">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10344">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10345">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10345">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10346">da sette a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10346">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10347">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10347">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10348">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10348">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10349">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10350">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10351">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10352">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10352">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10353">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10353">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10354">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10354">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10355">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10355">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10356">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10356">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10357">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10357">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10358">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10367">Numero di identificazione fiscale spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10367">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10368">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10369">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10369">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10370">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10370">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10371">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10371">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10372">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10372">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10373">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10373">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10374">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10375">sette o otto cifre e una o due lettere nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10375">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10376">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10377">Spagnolo Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10377">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10378">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10378">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10379">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10379">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10380">Spagnoli non residenti senza carta di identità nazionale di Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10380">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10381">una lettera maiuscola "L" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10381">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10382">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10382">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10383">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10383">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10384">Spagnoli residenti di età inferiore a 14 anni senza carta d'identità nazionale spagna:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10384">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10385">una lettera maiuscola "K" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10385">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10386">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10386">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10387">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10387">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10388">Stranieri con numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10388">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10389">una lettera maiuscola che è "X", "Y" o "Z" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10389">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10390">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10390">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10391">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10392">Stranieri senza numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10392">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10393">una lettera maiuscola che è "M" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10393">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10394">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10395">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10396">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10397">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10398">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10399">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10400">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10400">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10401">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10401">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10402">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10402">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10403">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10403">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10434">SQL Server stringa di connessione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10434">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10435">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10436">La stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10436">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10437">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10437">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10438">la stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10438">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10439">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10439">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10440">la stringa "Password" o "pwd" dove "pwd" non è preceduta da una lettera minuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10440">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10441">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10441">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10442">qualsiasi carattere che non sia un simbolo del dollaro ($), un simbolo di percentuale (%), un simbolo di maggiore di (>), un simbolo di simbolo (@), virgolette ("), un punto e virgola (;), una parentesi graffa sinistra([) o una parentesi quadra sinistra ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10442">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10443">qualsiasi combinazione di 7-128 caratteri che non siano un punto e virgola (;), barra (/) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10443">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10444">un punto e virgola (;) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10444">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10445">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10446">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10446">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10447">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10448">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10448">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10449">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10449">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10450">Una parola chiave CEP_GlobalFilter non viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10450">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10451">L'espressione CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10451">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10452">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10452">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10480">Numero di patente di guida in Svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10480">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10481">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10482">dieci cifre contenenti un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10482">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10483">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10484">dieci cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10484">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10485">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10485">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10486">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10486">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10487">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10487">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10488">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10489">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10489">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10490">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10491">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10492">L'espressione  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10492">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10493">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10626">Svezia - ID nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10626">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10627">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10628">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10628">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10629">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10630">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10630">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10631">due cifre (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10631">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10632">Sei cifre nel formato data AAMMGG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10632">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10633">delimitatore di "-" o "+" (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10633">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10634">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10634">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10635">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10636">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10636">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10637">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10638">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10638">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10639">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10639">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10640">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10640">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10641">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10641">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10642">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10642">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10643">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10643">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10644">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10644">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10663">Svezia - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10663">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10664">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10665">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10665">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10666">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10667">otto cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10667">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10669">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10670">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10671">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10671">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10672">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10672">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10673">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10673">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10674">l'espressione regolare trova una data nel formato `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (01 JAN/JAN 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10674">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10675">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10676">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10676">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10677">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10677">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10713">Numero di identificazione fiscale svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10713">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10714">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10715">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10716">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10717">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10718">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10719">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10720">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10721">10 cifre e un simbolo nel motivo specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10721">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10722">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10723">10 cifre e un simbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10723">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10724">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10724">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10725">segno più o meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10725">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10726">tre cifre che rendono univoco il numero di identificazione dove:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10726">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10727">per i numeri emessi prima del 1990, la settima e l'ottava cifra identificano la provincia di nascita o i nati all'estero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10727">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10728">la cifra nella nona posizione indica il sesso per dispari per il maschio o anche per la donna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10728">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10729">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10730">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10731">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10732">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10733">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10734">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10734">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10735">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10735">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10736">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10737">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10737">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10763">Codice SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10763">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10764">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10765">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10765">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10766">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10767">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10767">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10768">Codice bancario di quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10768">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10769">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10769">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10770">4-28 lettere o cifre (BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10770">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10771">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10771">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10772">da una a tre lettere o cifre (resto del BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10772">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10773">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10774">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10774">No</span></span>

```xml

        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />

</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10815">Svizzera - Numero AVS SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10815">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10816">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10817">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10818">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10819">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10820">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10821">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10822">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10823">Numero a 13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10823">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10824">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10825">Numero a 13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10825">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10826">tre cifre - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10826">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10827">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10827">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10828">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10829">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10829">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10830">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10830">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10831">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10831">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10832">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10832">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10833">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10834">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10834">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10835">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10836">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10836">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10837">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10837">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10838">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10838">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10839">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10840">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10840">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10861">Taiwan - Numero di identificazione nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10861">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10862">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10863">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10863">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10864">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10865">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10865">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10866">una lettera (in inglese, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10866">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10867">la cifra "1" o "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10867">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10868">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10868">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10869">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10870">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10870">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10871">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10872">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10872">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10873">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10873">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10874">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwanese_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10874">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10875">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10876">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10876">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10877">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10877">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10878">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10879">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10879">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10895">Numero di passaporto taiwanese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10895">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10896">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10896">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10897">Numero di passaporto biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10897">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10898">numero di passaporto non biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10898">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10899">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10899">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10900">numero di passaporto biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10900">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10901">il carattere "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10901">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10902">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10902">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10903">numero di passaporto non biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10903">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10904">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10904">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10905">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10906">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10906">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10907">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10908">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10909">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_passport trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10909">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10910">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_taiwan_passport da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10910">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10914">Numero passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10914">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10915">N° passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10915">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10916">Num. passaporto
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10916">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10917">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10917">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10918">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10918">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10919">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10919">中華民國護照</span></span>
