## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10921">Numero di certificato residente a Taiwan (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10921">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10922">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10923">10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10923">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10924">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10925">10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10925">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10926">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10926">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10927">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10927">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10928">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10929">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10930">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10931">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10931">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10932">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10932">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10933">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10933">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10934">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10934">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10935">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10935">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10937">Resident Cert</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10938">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10939">Carta d’identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10939">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10940">Certificato residente straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10940">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10941">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10941">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10942">Certificato residente nell’area di Taiwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10942">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10946">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10946">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10947">Codice di identificazione della popolazione thai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10947">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10948">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10949">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10949">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10950">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10951">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10951">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10952">la prima cifra non è zero o nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10952">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10953">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10953">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10954">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10955">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10955">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10956">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10957">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10957">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10958">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10958">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10959">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10959">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10960">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10961">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10961">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10962">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10962">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10963">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10963">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10964">Numero ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10964">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10965">Numero di identificazione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10965">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10966">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10966">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10967">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10967">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10968">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10968">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10969">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10969">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10970">Numero di identificazione nazionale turco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10970">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10971">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10972">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10972">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10973">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10974">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10974">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10975">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10976">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10976">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10977">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10978">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10979">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10979">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10980">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Turkish_National_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10980">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10981">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10982">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10982">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10989">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10989">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10990">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10990">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10991">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10992">Combinazione di 18 lettere e numeri nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10992">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10993">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10994">18 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10994">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10995">Cinque lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10995">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10996">Una cifra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10996">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10997">Cinque cifre nel formato di data MMDDY per la data di nascita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10997">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10998">Il settimo carattere viene incrementato di 50 se driver è femminile. per exampe, da 51 a 62 invece che da 01 a 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10998">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-10999">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-10999">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11000">Cinque cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11000">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11001">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11002">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11003">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11004">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11005">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11005">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11006">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11006">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11007">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11007">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11008">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11008">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11009">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11009">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11010">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11010">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11131">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11131">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11132">numero di rullino elettorale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11132">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11133">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11133">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11134">due lettere seguite da 1-4 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11134">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11135">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11135">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11136">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da 1-4 numeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11136">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11137">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11138">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11139">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11140">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11140">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11141">L'espressione regolare Regex_uk_electoral restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11141">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11142">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11142">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11143">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11143">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11145">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11145">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11146">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11146">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11147">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11147">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11148">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11148">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11149">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11149">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11150">numero del servizio sanitario nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11150">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11151">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11152">10-17 cifre separate da spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11152">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11153">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11154">10-17 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11154">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11155">3 o 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11155">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11156">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11156">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11157">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11157">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11158">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11158">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11159">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11159">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11160">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11161">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11162">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11163">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11163">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11164">La funzione Func_uk_nhs_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11164">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11165">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11165">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11166">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11166">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11167">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11167">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11168">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11169">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11170">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11170">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11181">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11181">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11182">Criteri di gruppo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11182">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11183">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11183">DOB</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11187">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11187">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11189">Questa entità del tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11189">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11190">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11190">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11191">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11192">sette o nove caratteri separati da spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11192">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11193">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11194">due modelli possibili:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11194">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11195">due lettere (i VALORI NINO validi utilizzano solo determinati caratteri in questo prefisso, convalidato da questo modello, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11195">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11196">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11196">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11197">'A', 'B', 'C' o 'D' (come il prefisso, nel suffisso sono consentiti solo determinati caratteri, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11197">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11198">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11198">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11199">due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11199">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11200">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11200">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11201">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11201">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11202">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11202">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11203">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11203">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11204">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11204">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11205">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11205">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11206">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11206">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11207">"A", "B", "C" o "D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11207">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11208">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11209">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11209">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11210">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11211">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11211">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11212">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11212">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11213">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11213">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11239">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11240">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11248">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11248">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11252">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11253">La funzione  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11253">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11275">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11276">6-17 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11276">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11277">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11280">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11280">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11281">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11282">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11282">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11283">L'espressione regolare Regex_usa_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11283">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11284">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11284">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11314">Numero di patente di guida statunitense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11314">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11315">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11316">Varia in base allo stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11316">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11317">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11318">dipende dallo stato, ad esempio New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11318">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11319">le nove cifre formattate come ddd ddd ddd corrisponderanno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11319">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11320">nove cifre come dddddddddd non corrispondono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11320">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11321">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11322">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11322">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11323">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11324">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11325">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11325">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11326">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11326">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11327">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11327">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11328">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11328">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11329">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11329">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11330">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11330">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11331">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11331">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11332">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11332">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11430">Numero di identificazione del singolo contribuente statunitense (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11430">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11431">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11432">nove cifre che iniziano con "9" e contengono "7" o "8" come quarta cifra, facoltativamente formattate con spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11432">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11433">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11434">formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11434">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11435">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11435">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11436">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11436">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11437">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11437">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11438">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11438">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11439">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11439">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11440">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11440">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11441">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11441">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11442">non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11442">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11443">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11443">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11444">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11444">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11445">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11445">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11446">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11446">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11447">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11448">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11449">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11450">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11450">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11451">La funzione Func_formatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11451">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11452">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11452">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11453">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11453">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11454">La funzione Func_unformatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11454">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11455">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11455">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11456">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11456">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11457">La funzione Func_formatted_itin o Func_unformatted_itin trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11457">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11458">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11458">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11459">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11459">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11462">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11462">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11463">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11463">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11464">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11464">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11465">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11465">ssn</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11472">Numero di previdenza sociale statunitense (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11472">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11473">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11474">nove cifre, che possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11474">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11475">Se emesso prima della metà del 2011, un SSN ha una formattazione solida in cui alcune parti del numero devono rientrare in determinati intervalli per essere valide (ma non è presente alcun checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11475">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11476">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11477">Quattro funzioni ricercano i nomi SSN in quattro modelli diversi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11477">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11478">Func_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla 2011 formattata con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11478">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla versione 2011 non formattata come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn trova sSN post-2011 formattati con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn trova SSN post-2011 non formattati come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11482">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11483">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11483">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11484">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11485">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11486">La funzione Func_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11486">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11487">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11487">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11488">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11488">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11489">La funzione Func_unformatted_ssn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11489">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11490">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11490">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11491">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11491">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11492">La funzione Func_randomized_formatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11492">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11493">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11493">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11494">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11494">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11495">La funzione Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11495">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11496">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11496">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11497">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11497">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11498">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11498">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11499">SSA Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11499">SSA Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11501">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11501">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11502">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11502">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11503">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11503">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11504">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11504">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11505">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11505">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11506">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11506">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11507">SSNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11507">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11508">SSN #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11508">SSN#</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11511">Stati Uniti / Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11511">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11512">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11512">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11513">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11514">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11514">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11515">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11516">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11516">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11517">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11518">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11518">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11519">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11520">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11521">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11521">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11522">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11522">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11523">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11523">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11524">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11525">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11525">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11526">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11526">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11527">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11527">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11528">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11528">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11529">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11529">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11530">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11530">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11531">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11531">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11542">Passaporto ucraino nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11542">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11543">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11543">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11544">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11544">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11545">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11545">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11546">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11546">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11547">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11547">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11548">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11548">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11549">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11550">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11550">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11551">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11552">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11552">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11553">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11554">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11554">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11555">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11556">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11556">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11557">L'espressione Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11557">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11558">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11558">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11574">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11574">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11576">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11577">Schema alfanumerico a otto caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11577">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="d9a1b-11583">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="d9a1b-11583">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
